title: Echoing Gallery
description: Dusty portraits line the walls, their eyes seeming to follow you. Each footstep lands like a drumbeat in an abandoned church.

items.name: Fractured Locket
items.description: Contains a faded photograph of someone almost—but not quite—familiar.

items.name: Old Recorder
items.description: A click and static. Then, a voice you recognize says your name.

title: Reverie Alcove
description: A sunbeam illuminates a reading chair worn smooth by time. Books open to dog-eared pages rest as if just set down.

items.name: Pressed Flower
items.description: Still fragrant. A relic from a day you’d forgotten until now.

title: The Archive Beneath
description: Shelves curve endlessly into the dark. You swear the files are rearranging themselves when you’re not looking.

items.name: Burned Letter
items.description: Only the words 'never again' are legible.

items.name: Ink-stained Index Card
items.description: It lists names you’ve dreamed about. One is underlined.

title: Hollow Spire
description: A black tower that hums with silence. The interior spirals upward without any visible light source.

items.name: Obsidian Shard
items.description: It reflects nothing, not even light.

items.name: Null Seal
items.description: An unopenable envelope that absorbs heat when touched.

title: Cradle of Dusk
description: The land dips here into a smooth, featureless depression. The sky above it is permanently twilight.

items.name: Unmarked Hourglass
items.description: The sand inside flows sideways.

title: Unworded Library
description: Books line the shelves, but every page is blank. Yet you feel watched when you open one.

items.name: Black Quill
items.description: Writing appears when held near your skin.

items.name: Silken Bookmark
items.description: It flutters even without wind.

title: Somnus Atrium
description: Pillars of mist twist upward into an invisible ceiling. The air tastes faintly of lavender and static electricity.

items.name: Lucid Pendant
items.description: Wearing it makes your footsteps silent and your thoughts loud.

items.name: Feather of an Unseen Bird
items.description: Warm to the touch. Feels like a memory from someone else's life.

title: The Cradle Unmade
description: A floating bed of roots and ribbons hovers over a lake that reflects nothing. Gentle music echoes without source.

items.name: Spindle Doll
items.description: Its limbs rearrange when unobserved. It hums lullabies at night.

items.name: Ribbon of Forgetting
items.description: Tying it around your wrist makes it harder to recall your name.

title: The Glass Meadow
description: Blades of transparent grass sway in a nonexistent breeze. When broken, they chime like bells.

items.name: Stained Glass Seed
items.description: Planting it summons a fleeting vision of a possible future.

title: The Twin Hall
description: Two hallways face each other, identical in form, yet each detail mirrored. Every step echoes twice.

items.name: Polished Coin
items.description: One side always shows your face. The other is blank.

items.name: Mirror Sliver
items.description: It always reflects what you refuse to acknowledge.

title: The Infinite Stair
description: A spiraling staircase lined with panes of glass. In each, a version of you walks a different path.

items.name: Reflection Lens
items.description: Looking through it reveals others’ secrets—but only in reverse.

title: Stillwater Antechamber
description: The floor is a smooth lake reflecting stars not seen above. Your reflection moves on its own.

items.name: Silent Oath Ring
items.description: Said to bind you to the version of yourself you fear most.

items.name: Scrying Thread
items.description: Pulling it shows a glimpse of someone thinking about you.

title: The Howling Place
description: Dark wind howls through broken arches. The sound mimics your inner thoughts at their worst.

items.name: Gnawed Journal
items.description: Each page describes a failure you never told anyone about.

items.name: Unlit Lantern
items.description: Holding it makes others hesitate to meet your gaze.

title: The Chamber of Remains
description: Bone-white walls hold the remnants of forgotten choices. It smells faintly of salt and ash.

items.name: Cracked Mask
items.description: When worn, others perceive you as someone from your past.

items.name: Ash Vine
items.description: Still grows in your hand. Still burns your skin.

title: The Shrine of Denial
description: A defaced statue kneels in silent apology. Its shadow moves before it does.

items.name: Pact-Bound Chain
items.description: Unbreakable and warm, it tightens when lies are spoken.
